name: Nearverse
description:
Description:
Nearverse is a procedural generated shoot 'em up. By changing the universe matrix you'll get a different galaxy to face up: from graphics, background chip tune and enemy battle set, there are a total of 999999999999999999 possible combinations.

UPDATE #1

  • Added "AUTOFIRE" option in "SETTINGS" menu.
  • Marked available game area.
  • Fixed enemy death audio overlapping on boss death.
  • Fixed z-order of some spawned object.

Note:
Had this idea while back, honestly thought bigger, but still pleased with the turn out of this one.
Adjust the settings for the best viewing / performance experience; procedural music is highly unrecommended on mobile devices.
Due to mouse lock, to pause the game use RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON.

N.B.: There's a mouse drift problem on Firefox, if you experience problems use Chrome / Opera.
